description:
The Internet offers a host of opportunities to create a recurring income, but not all online moneymaking strategies are created equal.

This course will show you a really easy and affordable way to earn recurring profits online, without a membership site or membership software.

With the help of easy-to-use tools like Aweber, Paypal, and Warrior Forum, you’ll be able to set up an auto-responder page to get visitors to purchase your product, and you’ll write emails that will keep them coming back for more.

Craft an Online Membership Product That Will Lead to Recurring Profits

Throughout this easy-to-follow course, you’ll discover how to create an online membership product using an auto-responder website.

This simple product can be sold to anyone anywhere in the world, and you can earn your profits easily through Paypal.

In just a few steps, you’ll have everything you need to attract visitors, entice them to make a purchase, and keep them coming back for more by renewing their membership.

This all translates to a steady online income stream with minimal effort on your part. 

Course Content

After a brief introduction, you’ll dive right into using Aweber to create an auto-responder page. Then you’ll set up your own Paypal account, as well as uncover the best places to post your sales letter.

You’ll then gain valuable insight into the very best niches for making money online so you can target your auto-responder page to an audience that’s motivated to pay for products online.

In addition to niches, you’ll also cover offers that are the most popular and will allow you to easily establish a steady income stream.

To have a model for your sales letter, you’ll learn how to use Warrior Forum. This will give you the easy template you need to write your own sales letter from scratch.

Next, the instructor will show you how to craft a signup form so visitors can submit their email addresses to your mailing list after they make a purchase. You’ll even learn how to create a Paypal button for your page as well.

The longer you can keep customers on your mailing list, the more money you can make, so you’ll be shown how to write subsequent emails to your customers to stay in touch and keep their membership active. By the time you finish this course, you’ll know how to sell an online membership product on autopilot using Aweber, Paypal, and Warrior Forum. You’ll be able to quickly set up everything that you need and then sit back and let the revenue stream come in.
title: Create Recurring Profits Without Having A Membership Site
